mapper.select: select maintenance_arrange_id, machine_id, machine_name, employees_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_state, remark from maintenance_arrange where maintenance_arrange_id = #{maintenanceArrangeId}
mapper.insert: insert into maintenance_arrange(machine_id, machine_name, employees_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_state, remark) values (#{machineId}, #{machineName}, #{employeesName}, #{maintenanceDate}, #{maintenanceState}, #{remark})

insert into maintenance_arrange(machine_id, machine_name, employees_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_state, remark) values
(#{entity.machineId}, #{entity.machineName}, #{entity.employeesName}, #{entity.maintenanceDate}, #{entity.maintenanceState}, #{entity.remark})

insert into maintenance_arrange(machine_id, machine_name, employees_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_state, remark) values
(#{entity.machineId}, #{entity.machineName}, #{entity.employeesName}, #{entity.maintenanceDate}, #{entity.maintenanceState}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update machine_id = values(machine_id), machine_name = values(machine_name), employees_name = values(employees_name), maintenance_date = values(maintenance_date), maintenance_state = values(maintenance_state), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update maintenance_arrange
machine_id = #{machineId},
machine_name = #{machineName},
employees_name = #{employeesName},
maintenance_date = #{maintenanceDate},
maintenance_state = #{maintenanceState},
remark = #{remark},
where maintenance_arrange_id = #{maintenanceArrangeId}
